name: AI Tutor Pro
description: An AI-powered personalized learning platform for university students that adapts to individual learning styles and pace.
problem: Students struggle with one-size-fits-all teaching methods and lack personalized guidance outside classroom hours.
solution: Our AI-powered platform analyzes student performance and creates customized learning paths with 24/7 AI tutoring support.

name: HealthTrack
description: Mobile app for tracking student mental health and wellness with AI-powered mood analysis.
problem: University students face high stress and mental health challenges but lack accessible tracking and support tools.
solution: HealthTrack provides daily mood tracking, stress analytics, and connects students with counselors when needed.

name: GreenCampus
description: Sustainable waste management solution for university campuses using IoT sensors and smart recycling.
problem: University campuses generate massive amounts of waste with inefficient collection and low recycling rates.
solution: Smart bins with IoT sensors optimize collection routes and incentivize recycling through a reward system.

name: StudyBuddy
description: Peer-to-peer tutoring marketplace connecting students for collaborative learning.
problem: Many students excel in certain subjects but struggle in others, with limited access to affordable tutoring.
solution: Our platform matches students who need help with peer tutors, creating a collaborative learning community.

name: PayEase
description: Digital payment solution for campus transactions including cafeteria, bookstore, and printing services.
problem: Students carry cash and multiple cards for various campus services, leading to inefficiency and long queues.
solution: One unified digital wallet for all campus transactions with instant payments and reward points.

name: CampusCart
description: Online marketplace for buying and selling textbooks, electronics, and services within university.
problem: Students have no centralized platform to buy/sell used items, leading to wastage and overspending.
solution: Trusted marketplace exclusively for verified university students with secure payments and delivery.

name: CodeCollab
description: Collaborative coding platform for CS students with real-time pair programming and code review.
problem: CS students often code in isolation and lack collaborative tools for learning and project work.
solution: Real-time collaborative IDE with built-in code review, mentorship matching, and project collaboration.

name: SmartAttend
description: AI-based attendance tracking system using facial recognition for seamless classroom management.
problem: Manual attendance is time-consuming and prone to proxy issues, wasting valuable class time.
solution: Automated facial recognition system that marks attendance in seconds with anti-spoofing technology.

name: MediConnect
description: Platform connecting students with healthcare providers on campus.
problem: Students struggle to find and book appointments with campus healthcare services efficiently.
solution: Unified platform for booking appointments, accessing medical records, and connecting with campus health services.

name: EcoRide
description: Campus carpooling app to reduce carbon footprint.
problem: Students drive alone to campus daily, creating traffic congestion and high carbon emissions.
solution: Carpooling platform that matches students with similar routes, reducing vehicles and promoting sustainability.
